name: Green energy
description:
The readjustment of the FiT demonstrates how Government policy impacts market conditions and consumer choice.  The Green energy seminar stream will examine the Energy Bill and unravel incentives for power and heat generation.
Covering micro generation to community and small- to medium-scale commercial green energy projects, this series of seminars will also provide technology updates and cover some of the practical and technical issues relating to specifying and installing specific green technologies.  Exemplary case studies across the spectrum of project sizes and building/ location type highlight new technologies and best practice pointers.
